#summary List of distributions for download, and describes the history of release distributions
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Downloads =

The following is a list of distribution zip files of the project for download.

There are two types of files here:
 * [#Full_Distributions *Full* distributions] of the project, including: jar file, source files, unit tests, javadocs and demos. Most users should take this option. Get the <font color="red">*LATEST*</font> [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-1.3.zip v1.3 here].
 * [#Jar-only_Distributions *Jar-only* distributions] of the project, including: jar file. This option only for experienced users who wish to update their jar.

See more details on the distributions below at [#Release_History].

= Release History =
 * v1.3 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-1.3.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-1.3.zip jar]) - 19/7/2015 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=691 svn 691] - Added AutoAnalyser (Code Generator) GUI demo for MI and TE; Added auto-embedding capability via Ragwitz criteria for AIS and TE calculators (KSG estimators); Added Java demo 9 for showcasing use of Ragwitz auto-embedding; Adding small amount of noise to data in all KSG estimators now by default (may be disabled via setProperty()); Added getProperty() methods for all conditional MI and TE calculators; Upgraded Python demos for Python 3 compatibility; Fixed bias correction on mixed discrete-continuous KSG calculators; Updated the tutorial slides to those in use for ECAL 2015 JIDT tutorial.
 * v1.2.1 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-1.2.1.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-1.2.1.zip jar]) - 12/2/2015 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=621 svn 621] - Added tutorial slides, description of exercises and sample exercise solutions; Made jar target Java 1.6; Added Schreiber TE heart-breath rate with KSG estimator demo code for Python.
 * v1.2 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-1.2.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-1.2.zip jar]) - 28/1/2015 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=601 svn 601] - Dynamic correlation exclusion, or Theiler window, added to all Kraskov estimators; Added univariate MI calculation to simple demo 6; Added Java code for Schreiber TE heart-breath rate with KSG estimator, ready for use as a template in Tutorial; Patch for crashes in KSG conditional MI algorithm 2;
 * v1.1 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-1.1.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-1.1.zip jar]) - 20/11/2014 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=576 svn 576] - Implemented Fast Nearest Neighbour Search for Kraskov-Stögbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimators for MI, conditional MI, TE, conditional TE, AIS, Predictive info, and multi-information. This includes a general (multivariate) k-d tree implementation; Added multi-threading (using all available processors by default) for the KSG estimators -- code contributed by Ipek Özdemir; Added Predictive information / Excess entropy implementations for KSG, kernel and Gaussian estimators; Added R, Julia, and Clojure demos; Added Windows batch files for the Simple Java Demos; Added property for adding a small amount of noise to data in all KSG estimators;
 * v1.0 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-1.0.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-1.0.zip jar]) - 14/8/2014 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=434 svn 434] - Added the draft of the paper on the toolkit to the release; Javadocs made ready for release; Switched source->destination arguments for discrete TE calculators to be with source first in line with continuous calculators; Renamed all discrete calculators to have Discrete suffix -- TE and conditional TE calculators also renamed to remove "Apparent" prefix and change "Complete" to "Conditional"; Kraskov estimators now using 4 nearest neighbours by default; Unit test for Gaussian TE against ChaLearn Granger causality measurement; Added Schreiber TE demos; Interregional transfer demos; documentation for Interaction lag demos; added examples 7 and 8 to Simple Java demos; Added property to add noise to data for Kraskov MI; Added derivation of Apache Commons Math code for chi square distribution, and included relevant notices in our release; Inserted translation class for arrays between Octave and Java; Added analytic statistical significance calculation to Gaussian calculators and discrete TE; Corrected Kraskov algorithm 2 for conditional MI to follow equation in Wibral et al. 2014.
 * v0.2.0 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-0.2.0.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-0.2.0.zip jar]) - 17/04/2014 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=284 svn 284] - Rearchitected (most) Transfer Entropy and Multivariate TE calculators to use an underlying conditional mutual information calculator, and have arbitrary embedding delay, source-dest delay; this includes moving Kraskov-Grassberger Transfer Entropy calculator to use a single conditional mutual information estimator instead of two mutual information estimators; Rearchitected (most) Active Information Storage calculators to use an underlying mutual information calculator; Added Conditional Transfer Entropy calculators using underlying conditional mutual information calculators; Moved mixed discrete-continuous calculators to a new "mixed" package; bug fixes.
 * v0.1.4 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-0.1.4.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-0.1.4.zip jar]) - 11/09/2013 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=241 svn 241] - added scripts to generate CA figures for 2013 book chapters; added general Java demo code; added Python demo code; made Octave/Matlab demos and CA demos properly compatible for Matlab; added extra Octave/Matlab general demos; added more unit tests for MI and conditional MI calculators, including against results from Wibral's TRENTOOL; bug fixes
 * v0.1.3 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-0.1.3.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-0.1.3.zip jar]) - 13/01/2013 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=151 svn 151] - updated to make demo Octave/Matlab code properly Matlab compatible; added more unit tests including against results from Kraskov's implementation of MI; made Kraskov calculators use max norm by default instead of via property setting; bug fixes
 * v0.1.2 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-0.1.2.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-0.1.2.zip jar]) - 19/11/2012 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=116 svn 116] - updated to include demo code for "Moving frames of reference ..." and "Measuring information-transfer delays" paper
 * v0.1.1 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-dist-0.1.1.zip full], [http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-0.1.1.zip jar]) - 30/10/2012 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=104 svn 104] - first full distribution with ant file, javadocs, jar, junit tests.
 * v0.1 ([http://lizier.me/joseph/software/jidt/download.php?file=infodynamics-jar-0.1.zip jar]) - 24/10/2012 - first jar distribution
